title: New: Sweater Beats – MLLNDLLR
body: Trap music is the future, or so [the word on the street is](http://www.nialler9.com/trap-music/). Personally I have no idea what the genre tag means, and I don’t really care either when the tracks are this good. **Sweater Beats**, a young producer from New York, sets this cut alight with choppy samples and 80’s style hooks, with hints of **Star Slinger** throughout. Check out _MLLNDLLR_ below.
